channel.title: 2 things
channel.description:
1) I have a server but when somebody joins it, their screen turns white and they can't join the server. How can I fix this?
2) Are there any sources that has like 7 buttons below where you type (game, public, private, trade, etc.) and not 4? I can't find any..

item.title: 2 things
item.dc:creator: @rang3i_lyf3 rang3i lyf3
item.description:
@rang3i_lyf3 wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:2, topic:368990”][quote author=Iownedu89 link=topic=465120.msg3401330#msg3401330 date=1289949733]

  1. I have a server but when somebody joins it, their screen turns white and they can’t join the server. How can I fix this?

  2. Are there any sources that has like 7 buttons below where you type (game, public, private, trade, etc.) and not 4? I can’t find any…
    [/quote]

1: I think this means that their client isn’t compatible with your server. Make sure telling them the right protocol.

2: Yes, you need another client. Try a higher protocol.[/quote] i agree

Read full topic

item.title: 2 things
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“Iownedu89, post:1, topic:368990”]1) I have a server but when somebody joins it, their screen turns white and they can’t join the server. How can I fix this?

  1. Are there any sources that has like 7 buttons below where you type (game, public, private, trade, etc.) and not 4? I can’t find any…[/quote]

1: I think this means that their client isn’t compatible with your server. Make sure telling them the right protocol.

2: Yes, you need another client. Try a higher protocol.

Read full topic
